transcript: I've actually lost everything twice both with Lila both in the first year of us being together yeah I mean the early days were very tough they were very hard for me I always felt like I was almost there but I never really got there and I I had this big win selling the gyms and I thought okay I think I finally got it only did it get crushed like 30 days later cuz I put all that money into a new account I was going to start this new business with a partner partner drain the account and so I was like what
